message: This offer gives me a slight advantage considering the inflation, but it's a fair starting point. Let's avoid letting the money devalue too much.
Your starting offer was a bit too skewed in your favor, Alice. This is more balanced, and we should take advantage of the higher value now before inflation eats away at it too much more.

Bob, I understand your point about my initial offer, but yours swung things too far in the other direction. This offer represents a more balanced compromise, especially considering the continued devaluation.
